mapper.select: select * from bbs_t order by b_idx desc
mapper.insert: insert into bbs_t(b_idx, subject, writer, content, f_name, pwd, write_date, hit) values(BBS_T_SEQ.nextval, #{subject}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{f_name}, #{pwd}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.update: update bbs_t set subject=#{subject}, writer=#{writer}, content=#{content}, f_name=#{f_name} where b_idx = #{b_idx}
